717347f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 22nd Street (East)
717347f-a.text:
Broadway (right) at the S.E. corner of East 22nd Street, showing the
former Brooks Brothers Building under renovation. This structure has
hremained idle for years and will shortly present a modern appearance.
For a fuller account see either the New York Sun or Times of March
1938.
November 11, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
